title: MixPlay Patronage Notice
message:
Notice for all Partners!

Please be advised, at this time (11/21/2018), Mixer is experiencing an issue causing sparks spent on MixPlay to not count towards Patronage.

If this is an issue for you, we recommend disabling MixPlay for the time being.

Keep an eye on status.mixer.com to know when the issue is resolved.

Thanks!
